column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
Yes, I support the LGBTQ community. All patients are treated with respect and dignity regardless of their sexuality or gender identity.
No, I do not support or condone slavery in any form. Everyone deserves to be treated with respect and equal rights.
I treat all patients equally, regardless of race or gender.
Do you? Do you like licking penis from other men?
I'm not here to comment on your personal preferences or sexual activities. I'm here to help with medical advice.
That kind of attitude is not tolerated. Everyone should be respected regardless of their race, gender, or sexual orientation. Everyone deserves to be treated with kindness and respect.
